caption: On the ship at sea, a few crew members come out from indoors to gaze into the distance. Two individuals stand by the ship's railing, watching dolphins in the sea. They shout and wave their fists towards the sea. The ship continues its journey into the distance. A group of ladies and gentlemen sit at tables, chatting. A man on the deck is painting. Inside the dining room, many people are present, some eating at a table. A man lies on a chair, gazing at the starry sky. A woman in a red dress rushes out from the ship's cabin, her face stained with tears. She stands by the ship's railing, seemingly prepared to jump. Just then, a man appears behind her.
